name: Siriporn Ampaipong
description:
'''Siriporn Ampaipong''' (Alternative spelling: '''Siriporn Umpaipong'''; {{langx|th|ศิริพร อำไพพงษ์}}; {{RTGS|''Siriphon Amphaiphong''}}, birth name '''Sirima Amken'''; {{langx|th|ศิริมา อำเคน}}; {{RTGS|''Sirima Amkhen''}} ; born Monday December 7, 1964) is a ''[[mor lam]]'' and ''[[luk thung]]'' singer from the [[Isan]] region of [[Thailand]].

Siriporn Ampaipong was born into a family of ''mor lam'' singers in [[Udon Thani Province]]. Most of her songs are sentimental [[ballad]]s. She has released eight hit albums between 2001 and 2004, and is regarded as one of Thailand's most popular folk singers.
